title: バキ―New grappler Baki No.1
description: One by one the world's deadliest death row convicts come to Tokyo to get "a taste of defeat." Finally, they meet face to face in the underground martial arts arena!! With over 60 million copies printed, the BAKI series spans 4 completed series with a 5th on the way, all following Baki Hanma on his various quests to defeat his father. A new BAKI anime focused on this part of the epic will premiere on Netflix this year!
author: Keisuke Itagaki
